attributes.action: Outlaw hunting foxes with hounds as barbaric and unlawful as dog fighting. A fox is a dog and it is fought by other dogs, and this, surely, equates to the same scenario
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Hunting foxes with hounds has, quite rightly, been made illegal by the present government. Would it not, however, be even more sensible to liken hunting a wild dog (vulpes vulpes)with hounds to the, already illegal, dog fighting as this amounts to the same offence?

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
